sentences.sentence: He is going to abnegate his plan.
If love and friendship can't be together, I will abnegate the resultless love.
sentences.translation: 如果爱与友情不能并存，那我定会放弃一份无结果的爱。

sentences.sentence: It can abnegate useless samples and make the knowledge of study objects accumulate.
sentences.translation: 该算法舍弃对最终结论无用的样本，使得学习对象的知识得到了积累。
